subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Comcast and the N.F.L. ended a nearly three-year dispute and agreed to make the league's TV network available to 10 million of the cable operator's subscribers at a lower price.
snippet: Comcast and the N.F.L. ended a nearly three-year dispute and agreed to make the league's TV network available to 10 million of the cable operator's subscribers at a lower price.
